data.name: AddAgencyDescription
data.value:
You can continue working with your existing translation agency, and send translations to it through Text United. Just enter the agency's basic details and we will get in touch with them regarding the next steps.
NOTE: you cannot send the text you have just uploaded to your agency yet, it will take us a couple of days to arrange everything.

data.name: AddCoworkerDescription
data.value: Create a free account for a co-worker or partner company. They will receive an e-mail with a link and temporary password.

data.name: AddRepositoryFailed
data.value: Failed to add your repository to Text United. Please contact our support for help.

data.name: AddUserDescription
data.value: Invite someone else to join Text United.

data.name: AdministratorDescription
data.value: ADMINISTRATOR can use all features available in Text United. They can also upgrade, downgrade or block users and change the company's subscription plan.

data.name: DifferenceBetween
data.value: Difference between PERSONAL and BUSINESS editions

data.name: Differences
data.value:
The free edition of Text United for businesses supports some features that are not included in the Personal edition (which you are using now). The additional features are: :

  • unlimited number of users
  • different permission levels (Administrator/PowerUser/User)

  • possibility to perform and organize translations across a company
  • sharing and reusing translations across a company
  • easy inclusion of partner companies into the translation process
  • direct access to verified professional translators

If you want to you use Text United at work too, switch to the free edition for businesses.

data.name: DisposableEmailDomainsWarning
data.value: Temporary/disposable e-mail domains are not allowed.

data.name: DownloadDescription
data.value: Text United App is our desktop tool for translation, translation project management and terminology management. It is free for all Text United users.

data.name: DummyTranslatorTooltip
data.value: NOTE: For some files, the system cannot extract every piece of text for translation. For example, your files may contain some text within images. Use our Dummy Translator to check whether all text will be extracted automatically.

data.name: ErrorUnauthorized

data.name: EstimatedCostForTranslationTooltip
data.value: We identified all repetitive text and calculated the cost based on the language combination and real translator's rates. Estimate does not include translation of any text in images nor additional formatting of files. The final costs can be higher or lower for up to 5 %.

data.name: EstimateNote
data.value: The Cost Estimate above does not include the costs of extracting text from images. If you want to know the exact costs before ordering, ask for an offer first (below).

data.name: ForgottenPasswordSuccessMessage
data.value: A confirmation link has been sent to your e-mail, please follow the instructions there.

data.name: FreeAvailableCouponsDesc1
data.value: With free service coupons, you can order free translation and language checks from Text United for business content with up to 100 words.

data.name: FreeAvailableCouponsDesc2
data.value: When you signed up with Text United, you received one coupon as a small gift from us. Each time you use a free service, one coupon will be deducted from your coupon count. Don’t forget that you can always earn additional coupons by inviting other persons to sign up at Text United.

data.name: FreeServiceLimit
data.value: Your text contains more than 100 words!

data.name: FreeServicesCompanyText
data.value:
With free service coupons, you can order free translation and language checks from Text United for business content with up to 100 words. Each time you (or someone from your company) use a free service, one coupon will be deducted from your company's coupon count.

New coupons are added each month (if you have a paid subscription) and whenever a new user is added to your company at Text United.

data.name: FreeServicesDescription
data.value: Send up to 100 words to professional translators, and they will check the language or translate it for free. There are no hidden costs, but Free Services can be used a limited number of times. <br />How it works: Paste text, choose the service (“translation” or “language check”) and send. We will check if it is real business content, and deliver the final text back to you.

data.name: FreeServicesPersonalUserText
data.value:
With free service coupons, you can order free translation and language checks from Text United for business content with up to 100 words.

When you signed up with Text United, you received one coupon as a small gift from us. Each time you use a free service, one coupon will be deducted from your coupon count. Don’t forget that you can always earn additional coupons by inviting other persons to sign up at Text United.

data.name: FreeServiceSuccessful
data.value: You have successfully ordered a free service. Keep checking your e-mail inbox, we will soon send you a message there.

data.name: GenericErrorOccurred
data.value: An error occurred while processing your request, please try again!

data.name: InviteUserDescription
data.value: This person will not be associated with your company's account at Text United in any way, but can help you with translating or checking documents. Of course, you can invite them just to share how cool Text United is.

data.name: KeywordExtractionDescription
data.value: Extract the most important words from your text. It is instant and free. These languages are supported: English, French, German, Greek, Italian, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Thai.

data.name: NativeCheckDescription
data.value: Double-check the e-mails and files that you wrote in a foreign language with someone you trust. Make a good impression with international partners. <br /> How it works: Paste text or upload files, choose who checks your content, monitor the progress in real-time, get the final version right here.

data.name: PasteGithubTokenTooltip
data.value: To connect to a GitHub server to Text United, you will need a token. To obtain it, go to 'Edit Profile' in your GitHub account, click 'Personal access tokens' and then 'Generate new token'. Choose a name, permissions, generate the token and copy it. Then come back here, click 'Add new' button and paste that token.

data.name: PowerUserDescription
data.value: POWER USERS can use Text United to get translations from within the company (from co-workers or partner companies), but also order paid translation services from professionals. Power Users are typically persons that handle translations within a company.

data.name: QualityLevelMessage
data.value:
Ready for publishing: Choose this if you plan to publish the material. The translation will also be checked by another translator (proofreader).
Only for internal use (underlined): Choose this if you won't publish the material (potential human errors by the translator will not be spotted and corrected).

data.name: SummarizationDescription
data.value: Extract the most important content from your text. It is instant and free. These languages are supported: Czech, Dutch, English, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Polish, Spanish, Russian.

data.value: Failed to extract text from your file. Please try a different file type.

data.name: SummarizeByParagraphsTooltip
data.value: Check this option if you want the summary to have one sentence for each paragraph in your text.

data.name: SwitchToBussinesDescription
data.value: This edition of the Text United Assisted Translations for businesses is completely free. The only costs may occur if translation services are ordered from professional translators.

data.name: SwitchToBussinesDescriptionNote
data.value: NOTE: After you switch to this edition, you will be required to log in again.

data.value: The "VAT / Tax number" field is required

data.name: TranslateTextWithinImages
data.value: I want to translate also text within images and similar elements

data.name: TranslationAgencyNoPermission
data.value: It looks like you work at a translation agency. With this account type, you cannot create projects in the portal. Please use the Text United App.

data.name: TranslationDescription
data.value: Never translate and pay for anything twice – Text United enables translators to reuse similar sentences and work faster. <br /> How it works: Paste text / upload files, choose languages, choose who translates, send and monitor translation in real-time, get translated files right here.

data.name: TranslatorDescription
data.value: We'll create a Text United account for this person, so they don't have to bother. We will also send them a temporary password in an e-mail - they only need to choose a proper password and they are good to go.

data.name: TranslatorTypeDescription
data.value: Choose Text United Translation Services if you need professional translation services. Otherwise choose the Co-worker option.

data.name: UsersAssociated
data.value: Users associated with your company's account at Text United

data.name: ValidationFailed
data.value: Validation failed, please review the information below.

data.name: ValidationFailedCheckData
data.value: Validation failed, please check submited data!

data.name: VatNotIncluded
data.value: * VAT is not included in the cost

data.name: WaitLongerMessage
data.value: This might take a bit longer, please wait

data.name: WebsiteHomeAssistedTranslationsDesc
data.value: Tap into the potential of your co-workers or ask professional translators to do the work.

data.name: WebsiteHomeDevelopersDesc
data.value: Are you programming multilingual websites or apps and are tired of constant reiterations due to changing terminology? Integrate Text United with GitHub and get back to real coding!

data.name: WebsiteHomeFeaturesDesc
data.value: A full-stack option for everybody seeking a faster, cheaper and more transparent translation solution.

data.name: WebsiteHomeFreelanceRegiter
data.value:
Text United enables companies to do translations internally, but also to look for freelance translators in our database and send them translations directly. If you have 3+ years of translation experience, a degree in languages/translation and specialised expertise*, we invite you to join our network of professional translators for free.

The translators receive all jobs through the Text United App (a powerful, free cloud-based translation tool), with notifications about upcoming jobs sent also to their e-mail address. The translation or proofreading work is done right in the App.

*Text United verifies the information you provide before it has been made available to clients.

data.name: WebsiteHomeHowItWorks
data.value: Have you ever been tasked with a translation assignment?

data.name: WebsiteHomeHowItWorksDesc1
data.value: Text United allows users to handle translations <br class="mobile-hide" /> internally but also with the help of <br class="mobile-hide" /> experienced translators.

data.name: WebsiteHomeHowItWorksDesc2
data.value: Marketers, developers, tech doc managers <br class="mobile-hide" /> and business executives call all just relax <br class="mobile-hide" /> and enjoy the process.

data.name: WebsiteHomeHowMuch
data.value: How much does Text United cost?

data.name: WebsiteHomeHowMuchDesc
data.value: For personal use it's totally free. For businesses, we offer monthly subscriptions tailored to your needs.

data.name: WebsiteHomeMainTextDesc1
data.value: Text United brings you translations directly from your co-workers

data.name: WebsiteHomeMainTextDesc2
data.value: and professionals from around the world. Work easier, every day.

data.name: WebsiteHomeManagersDesc
data.value: What if you could speak every language in the world without even lifting a finger? Text United allows for inbound translation assisted by professionals. Try it.

data.name: WebsiteHomeMarketersDesc
data.value: Are you preparing promotional content for an international fair, globalizing the website or keeping tabs on consistent terminology across the board? Text United is exactly the software you need to get it done fast.

data.name: WebsiteHomeNoAgencyWorkflowDesc
data.value: Translations shouldn't be a guessing game. See what's happening with your order in real time.

data.name: WebsiteHomeTechWritersDesc
data.value: Most documents, guides and instructions have repetitive text. Why pay your agency for translating them over and over again when you can set up Text United and work in your native tongue, leaving the rest to us?

data.name: WebsiteHomeTUSoftwareDesc
data.value: Never translate the same sentence twice, Text United tools can re-use your old translations.

data.name: WebsiteHomeWhoUsesDesc
data.value: Anybody working with international text can get satisfaction from quality and speed that Text United provides.

data.name: WebsiteHomeWhyTUDesc
data.value: Click on any of the tiles below and see what Text United can do for you.

data.name: WebsiteHomeWorkEasier
data.value: Work easier, every day. Try Text United.

data.name: WordsRemainingForMonthTooltip
data.value: The Text United PERSONAL Edition that you are currently using has a limit of 10,000 words per month.

data.name: WorkingInCompany
data.value: Working in a company that can benefit from Text United Assisted Translations? Use the free edition for businesses.

data.name: AntiforgeryErrorMessage
data.value: It looks like you may be using two different user accounts inside same browser session. Please log out and try again.

data.name: AddUserFormDescription
data.value: Use this window only to add people working in your company. If you are trying to add someone from another company, use the “Add a partner company” button to do that.

data.name: SwitchAdminSuccess
data.value: You have successfully changed the administrator of your company!

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesCollaborationWithCoworkersDesc
data.value: Not all texts require professional translation. With Text United, you can ask co-workers to quickly translate or check your texts - our system will make that as easy as possible.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesFileFormatIndependenceDesc
data.value:
As an alternative provider of professional translation and localisation, Text United also solves the problem of file formats.

Our experienced DTP team can break down even the most complex file into pure text which we then translate.
Companies can do this internally too, and we can show you how!

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesFreeTranslationDesc
data.value: A free language translator is included with each Text United license. You can order free translations and language checks from Text United for your business content of up to 100 words.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesInboundTranslationsDesc
data.value:
Most companies have a hidden potential they are not aware of - their international partners, offices abroad and multilingual employees.

Text United empowers companies to tap into that inbound potential to get better translation for less money.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesInCountryReviewDesc
data.value:
Have you ever asked partner companies from other countries to improve the translation of your content?

Our system for in-country reviewing allows them to check if translators are using correct terminology appropriate for your product, even during translation. This saves time spent on corrections and prevents costly errors.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesIntegrationsDesc
data.value: Integration is possible with Text United! Experience the full integration with your CMS through API, or with your GitHub repositories for seamless software localization and website translation projects.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesLanguageConvertersDesc
data.value:
Language is not only translation. You can use Text United to extract important words and terms from a text, or summarize long documents with a click of the mouse.

Or run our Dummy Translator to see how your files will look like when translated, without actually doing any translation.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesOnDemandAssistanceDesc
data.value:
In case there's translation that you simply cannot handle on your own, you can always get help from Text United experts.

This is another aspect of our Assisted Translations concept - experienced translation project managers can give you a hand with your complex technical documentation, website translation or software localization.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesOneStopOrderingDesc
data.value:
Text United portal gives you a choice to order translations from your co-workers or professional translators, monitor how quickly they translate and download the translated files, all from one place.

Translation project management cannot be simpler than that.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesProfessionalTranslationServicesDesc
data.value: Text United is the fastest way to order translations services. Translation is done directly by professional translation specialists from around the world - it is not an English-translator-only community but much more than that. And it does not matter if you need to translate just one page or your whole website, Text United can give you a hand.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesRealTimeProgressMonitoringDesc
data.value:
Text United is not only a translation company but also an innovative translation system that makes things easier for the customer.

Whenever you order translations through Text United (either from your co-workers or translation professionals) you can see exactly what their status is. You will never need to ask for a status report again.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesTerminologyToolsDesc
data.value:
Glossaries and dictionaries guarantee that one company uses the same words across its documents and content. Text United takes this further by using interactive repositories that show the terms which need to be used in translation (in order to keep terminology consistency).

That's why Text United is not just a CAT tool for translation - it is a complete cloud-based alternative to systems like SDL Trados or Across.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesTranslationMemoryDesc
data.value:
Translation Memory technology stores all translations done for your company and prevents identical sentences to be translated again.

So, the next time you send a text for translation with Text United, our system will check if there's an old translation and automatically offer it to translators.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesTranslatorsFromAroundTheWorldDesc
data.value:
Text United creates translation jobs for thousands of professional translators in all major languages.

We gather only native speakers of the target languages, as our experience tells us that CERF (Common European Framework of Reference for Languages) and similar assessments are rarely good enough for professional translation.

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesTransparentCostsDesc
data.value:
If you order translation from professional, with text United you will always know what their costs are. Unlike translation agencies, we don't hide the cost structure - we open it up to customers instead.

If you send translation to your co-workers (in the office or abroad), you won't have any costs at all, so make sure you do that often :)

data.name: WebsiteFeaturesTranslationMemoryAlt
data.value: The more you translate the less you pay

data.name: ClickNextLC
data.value: Click the button Next to launch the text analysis and choose who does the check.

data.name: IcrAccountExistsMessage
data.value: An account with that email already exists.

data.name: ByRegisteringYouAgree
data.value: By registering, you agree to our

data.name: RegistrationConfirmationEmailContentIcr
data.value:
Hi,

Thank you for signing up. Please use the link below to activate your account:

{0}

Companies which use Text United often invite their partners from abroad to help with translation. These people are called "in-country reviewers" - you are now one of them. You will be asked to check if translators are using the correct terminology (technical words and expressions in your language), which is appropriate for your partner company's products.

This check is a simple process, done right in the web browser. You'll always be notified via e-mail if there's a review task for you.

data.name: ContactFormText
data.value: Hey there! Send us your requests for quotation or simply say hi!

data.name: IcrSignupText
data.value: If you are here, it’s probably because a partner company would like you to review their translations. Sign up using the form and we will send you an e-mail with more details.

data.name: WebsiteBenefitFromTextUnited
data.value: See how your company can also benefit from Text United.

data.name: WebsiteBenefitFromTextUnitedDesc
data.value: Text United is a full-stack option for everybody seeking a faster, cheaper and more transparent translation solution. It allows users to handle translations internally but also with the help of experienced translators. Marketers, developers, technical documentation managers and business executives can all just relax and enjoy the process.

data.name: WebsiteHomeNewsletterLabel
data.value: Do you want to get better in translation?

data.name: WebsiteHomeSlide1Title
data.value: Have you ever been tasked with a translation assignment?

data.name: WebsiteHomeSlide2Title
data.value: Did you go straight to Google and found yourself lost when researching for your best option?

data.name: WebsiteHomeSlide3Title
data.value: Enter the new era in translation

data.name: WebsiteHomeSlide4Title
data.value: Save time and money by translating with co-workers, partners and translation professionals from around the world!

data.name: WebsiteInCountryReviewerTitle
data.value: Sign up as an in-country reviewer!

data.name: WebsitePrivacy
data.value:
Website Visitors

Text United collects non-personally-identifying information of the sort that web browsers and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request. Text United’s purpose in collecting non-personally identifying information is to better understand how Text United’s visitors use its website. From time to time, Text United may release non-personally-identifying information in the aggregate, e.g., by publishing a report on trends in the usage of its website.

Text United also collects potentially personally-identifying information like Internet Protocol (IP) addresses. Text United does not disclose such information, other than under the same circumstances that it uses and discloses personally-identifying information, as described below.

Text United Website contains links to other sites that are outside of our control. These sites may have their own policy regarding privacy and it is in your interest to read their Privacy Policies.


Gathering of Personally-Identifying Information

Certain visitors to Text United’s websites choose to interact with Text United in ways that require Text United to gather personally-identifying information. The amount and type of information that Text United gathers depends on the nature of the interaction. For example, we ask visitors who sign up for a free translator’s account to provide his/her name, email address, country of residence and his/her mother language. Those who engage in transactions with Text United – by purchasing a subscription plan, for example – are asked to provide additional information, including as necessary the personal and financial information required to process those transactions. In each case, Text United collects such information only insofar as is necessary or appropriate to fulfill the purpose of the visitor’s interaction with Text United. Text United does not disclose personally-identifying information other than as described below. Visitors can always refuse to supply personally-identifying information, with the caveat that it may prevent them from engaging in certain website-related activities. Visitors who registered on Text United’s websites can (by contacting support@textunited.com) ask for a copy of their personal information, ask for the information to be corrected or updated or ask us to remove their personal information from our records.


Protection of Certain Personally-Identifying Information

Text United discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only to those of its employees, contractors and affiliated organizations that (i) need to know that information in order to process it on Text United’s behalf or to provide services available at Text United’s websites, and (ii) that have agreed not to disclose it to others. Some of those employees, contractors and affiliated organizations may be located outside of your home country; by using Text United’s websites, you consent to the transfer of such information to them. Text United will not rent or sell potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information to anyone. Other than to its employees, contractors and affiliated organizations, as described above, Text United discloses potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information only when required to do so by law, or when Text United believes in good faith that disclosure is reasonably necessary to protect the property or rights of Text United, third parties or the public at large. If you are a registered user of a Text United website and have supplied your email address, Text United may occasionally send you an email to tell you about new features, solicit your feedback, or just keep you up to date with what’s going on with Text United and our products. We primarily use our blog to communicate this type of information, so we expect to keep this type of email to a minimum. Text United takes all measures reasonably necessary to protect against the unauthorized access, use, alteration or destruction of potentially personally-identifying and personally-identifying information.


Cookies

A cookie is a string of information that a website stores on a visitor’s computer, and that the visitor’s browser provides to the website each time the visitor returns. Text United uses cookies to help Text United identify and track visitors, their usage of Text United website, and their website access preferences. Text United visitors who do not wish to have cookies placed on their computers should set their browsers to refuse cookies before using Text United’s websites, with the drawback that certain features of Text United’s websites may not function properly without the aid of cookies.

data.name: WebsiteTermsOfUse
data.value:
This Agreement ("Agreement") is between you (either you as an individual or you on behalf of an entity that you have the authority to bind and represent) (“Licensee”) and Text United GmbH ("Text United").

The Agreement authorizes you to use the Text United Software ("Software") as specified below.

The "Effective date" for this Agreement shall be the earlier day of the Licensee registering on Text United website or clicking "I agree" when installing the Software.


1. License and intellectual property rights

1.1 Text United grants to Licensee a personal, non-transferable, limited and non-exclusive right to access and use the Software (“License”).

1.2 The License is granted solely to Licensee, and not, by implication or otherwise, to any parent, subsidiary or affiliate of Licensee.

1.3 Text United reserves all rights not expressly granted to Licensee. Licensee shall not copy, distribute, reproduce, use or allow access to the Software, except as explicitly permitted under this Agreement. Licensee may not resell, sublicense, rent, lease, or lend the Software.

1.4 Licensee shall not modify, adapt, translate, or prepare derivative works from the Software and, to the extent permitted by applicable law, shall not, decompile, reverse engineer, disassemble or otherwise attempt to derive their source code.

1.5 Licensee shall not remove, obscure, or alter Text United's or its licensors’ copyright notices, trademarks, or other proprietary rights notices affixed to or contained within the Software.

1.6 Licensee acknowledges and agrees that Text United (or its licensors) own all legal right, title, and interest in and to the Software (whether those rights happen to be registered or not, and wherever in the world those rights may exist). Unless Licensee has agreed otherwise in writing with Text United, nothing in this Agreement gives Licensee a right to use any of Text United's (or its licensors’) trade names, trademarks, service marks, logos, domain names and other distinctive brand features.

1.7 The Software and all rights therein, without limitation (including title and intellectual property rights), are owned by Text United (or its licensors) and are protected by international treaty provisions


2. Access to the Software

2.1 In order to use the Software Licensee is required to register by providing certain information to Text United. Licensee underwrites that any information given to Text United is accurate, correct, and current.

2.2 Licensee may access the Software through a combination of an e-mail address and a password (“Account”). The access is personal and may not be admitted to other persons.

2.3 Licensee shall be entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of the password for the Account assigned to Licensee. Licensee shall immediately notify Text United if a password is lost, stolen, disclosed to an unauthorized third party, or has otherwise been compromised. Licensee shall be solely responsible for any and all activities made under Licensee's Account.

2.4 Licensee shall defend, indemnify and hold Text United harmless from and against all damages, penalties, costs and expenses (including reasonable attorney's fees) incurred by Text United in connection with any suit, claim or proceeding arising or resulting from Licensee's failure to comply with the terms of this Section 2.

2.5 Text United maintains a high level of service uptime. However, from time to time the Software may become unavailable and Text United reserves the right to interrupt the services to perform emergency maintenance as needed.


3. Subscription Plans

3.1 In the event Licensee wishes to use the Software in scope which exceeds the limitations of a free edition, Licensee must subscribe by choosing among available subscriptions (“Subscription Plans”) which features and costs are described on Text United’s websites.

3.2 Licensee agrees to pay to Text United subscription fees and any other charges (including any applicable taxes) incurred in connection with the chosen Subscription Plan(s) at the rates in effect when the Subscription Plan(s) was/were chosen.

3.3 Text United reserves the right to suspend Licensee’s access to the Software according to the Subscription Plan(s) if Licensee is late paying the fee for the Subscription Plan(s). Further, Text United is entitled to demand interest of 10 % p.a. for outstanding fees plus all expenses of collection. Licensee acknowledges that Text United is not obliged to retain Licensee’s Content and may delete all Content irretrievably if fees are outstanding for more than thirty days.

3.4 The Subscription Plan will be automatically renewed on the date of its scheduled expiration for an identical term, but at the then-prevailing fee, unless Licensee or Text United terminates the Subscription Plan prior to the date that the Subscription Plan expires. Licensee must cancel his Subscription Plan before it renews in order to avoid fees for another term.

3.5 Licensee and Text United may terminate the Subscription Plan with immediate effect at any time prior to the end of the intended term if the other party breaches any provision of this Agreement, including the failure to pay fees for the Subscription Plan when due. In addition, Text United may terminate the Subscription Plan at any time if Text United is required to do so by law.


4. Licensee Obligations

4.1 Licensee represents and warrants that:

4.1.1 it shall provide accurate and complete information during the registration process and shall not falsely identify himself/herself or provide any false information to gain or to attempt to gain access to the Software;

4.1.2 it shall not gain or to attempt to gain unauthorized access to Text United’s servers, its telecommunication and security equipment and software;

4.1.3 it shall not take any actions for the purpose of manipulating or undermining the integrity and accuracy of translators’ ratings;

4.1.4 it shall not engage in any form of retrieval of data stored on Text United’s servers to create or compile, directly or indirectly, a collection, compilation, database or directory;

4.1.5 it shall not attempt to or actually circumvent any method used by Text United to control access to the Software, including, but not limited to, spoofing or otherwise impersonating an account or setting up a proxy or other device that allows others to access the Software through it; and

4.1.6 it shall only use the Software in a manner that complies with all applicable laws in the jurisdiction in which Licensee uses them, including, but not limited to, applicable restrictions concerning copyright and other intellectual property rights.

4.2 In the event of any breach of any of the foregoing obligations, in addition to any other remedies available at law, Text United will have the right, in its sole reasonable discretion, to immediately terminate this Agreement.


5. Warranty Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability

5.1 TEXT UNITED LICENSES THE SOFTWARE AND THE SUITE, INCLUDING ANY DOCUMENTATION THAT MAY ACCOMPANY TO A LICENSEE ON AN "AS IS" BASIS. TEXT UNITED MAKES NO WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS, IMPLIED OR STATUTORY, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. TEXT UNITED DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE SOFTWARE WILL OPERATE IN COMBINATIONS OTHER THAN AS SPECIFIED IN ANY ACCOMPANYING DOCUMENTATION OR THAT THE OPERATION OF THE SOFTWARE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE.

5.2 IN NO EVENT WILL TEXT UNITED'S LIABILITY FOR ACTUAL DIRECT DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT OR THE USE OR PERFORMANCE OF THE SOFTWARE EXCEED THE AMOUNT UP TO 50 EURO. IN NO EVENT WILL TEXT UNITED BE LIABLE TO LICENSEE OR ANY OTHER INDIVIDUAL OR ENTITY CONNECTED WITH LICENSEE FOR ANY LOST PROFITS, SALES, BUSINESS, DATA, COSTS OF PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES OR ANY INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES RESULTING FROM THE USE OF THE SOFTWARE OR OTHERWISE ARISING FROM THIS AGREEMENT, AND NOTWITHSTANDING ANY FAILURE OF ESSENTIAL PURPOSE OF ANY LIMITED REMEDY. The parties agree that this Section 5.2 represents a reasonable allocation of risk.

5.3 Licensee shall defend, indemnify and hold Text United and its licensors harmless against any claims, damages, liabilities, losses, costs, suits or expenditures incurred by Text United or its licensors as a result of any infringement or alleged infringement of intellectual property rights of a third party or otherwise caused by Licensee’s use or exploitation of the Software.

5.4 This Agreement creates no obligations on the part of Text United other than as specifically set forth herein.


6. Term and Termination

6.1 This Agreement commences on the Effective Date and is concluded for an indefinite period of time.

6.2 Text United may, at any time, terminate this Agreement and/or terminate Licensee's access to the Software with 30 days advance notice. Text United may terminate this Agreement immediately if the Licensee fails to comply with any provision of this Agreement. In addition, Text United may terminate this Agreement immediately if Text United is required to do so by law.

6.3 Upon the expiration or termination of this Agreement for any reason (1) all licenses granted hereunder automatically revert to Text United and Licensee will no longer have access to the Software; (2) Text United is entitled to remove all Licensee’s Content from Text United servers.


7. Content

7.1 All Content (including translations) submitted by Licensee remains the sole property of Licensee (or its licensors).

7.2 Licensee represents and warrants to Text United that all Content does not in whole or in part actually or potentially violate any applicable law or regulation or infringe or misappropriate any proprietary intellectual property of any person and that Licensee owns or has a right to use all of the Content in the manner in which the Content is used in connection with the Software.

7.3 Text United will make all possible efforts to provide a backup mechanism for the Content. However, Licensee must keep a personal backup copy of the Content and Text United should not be held responsible of any loss of data or data corruption.


8. Data Protection

8.1 Text United will observe all provisions of the Austrian Data Protection Act and the Telecommunications Act regarding personal data, and undertake all technical and organizational measures required to protect the data for which it is responsible.

8.2 Text United is not obliged to verify the conformity of the Licensee’s data with the legal provisions for data protection. The Licensee is responsible for assuring the legality of the transfer of personal data to Text United.

8.3 Text United will adopt all reasonable measures to protect the Licensee’s data stored on Text United’s servers against unauthorized access. Text United however is not liable if third parties illegally obtain access to the data and information.


9. Miscellaneous

9.1 Licensee shall not assign any of its rights or delegate any of its obligations under this Agreement without the prior written consent of Text United. Subject to the foregoing, this Agreement will bind and inure to the benefit of the parties, their respective successors and permitted assigns.

9.2 This Agreement is governed by the laws of Austria. All disputes arising from or relating to this Agreement shall be settled by a single arbitrator appointed by the Chamber of Commerce of Austria.

9.3 The waiver by either party of a breach of any provision of this Agreement or the failure by either party to exercise any right hereunder shall not operate or be construed as a waiver of any subsequent breach of that right or as a waiver of any other right.

9.4 This is the entire agreement between Text United and Licensee relating to the subject matter of this Agreement, and it supersedes any prior representations, written or oral, discussions, undertakings, end-user agreements, communications, or advertising relating to the Software.

9.5 Text United reserves the right to change provisions of this Agreement from time to time.

9.6 Should any provision of this Agreement be or become illegal or unenforceable, the remainder of this Agreement shall not be affected. These provisions are automatically replaced by valid and enforceable provisions which achieve the intended economic effect as closely as possible.

9.7 Any feedback information from the Licensee shall be provided to Text United on a non-confidential basis and shall be considered property of Text United. By submitting any such information to Text United Licensee agrees to a no-charge assignment to Text United of all worldwide rights, title, and interest in copyrights and other intellectual property rights to the information.

9.8 Additional terms and conditions may apply to purchasing of translation services. Licensee agrees to abide by such other terms and conditions.

9.9 All notices should be delivered to: Text United GmbH, Attemsgasse 7 D20, 1220, Vienna, Austria.

data.name: DummyTranslationDesc
data.value: It is a cool option that does one very useful thing - replaces the text in your files with letters X. This allows you to see if all text will be processed correctly. If you see X letters only, that is good – in your files there is no text placed as graphic elements.
